00025 // main system configuration
00026 require '../../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00027 // start the session
00028 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00029 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session_check.inc.php';
00030 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/form_maker/simbio_form_table_AJAX.inc.php';
00031 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/template_parser/simbio_template_parser.inc.php';

00037 // privileges checking
00038 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('system', 'r');
00039 $can_write = utility::havePrivilege('system', 'w');
00040 
00041 // check if we want to change current user profile
00042 $changecurrent = false;
00043 if (isset($_GET['changecurrent'])) {
00044     $changecurrent = true;
00045 }
00046 
00047 if (!$changecurrent) {
00048     // only administrator have privileges add/edit users
00049     if ($_SESSION['uid'] != 1) {
00050         die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You don\'t have enough privileges to view this section').'</div>');
00051     }
00052 }

00054 /* RECORD OPERATION */
00055 if (isset($_POST['saveData'])) {
00056     $userName = trim(strip_tags($_POST['userName']));
00057     $realName = trim(strip_tags($_POST['realName']));
00058     $passwd1 = trim($_POST['passwd1']);
00059     $passwd2 = trim($_POST['passwd2']);
00060     // check form validity
00061     if (empty($userName) OR empty($realName)) {
00062         utility::jsAlert(__('User Name or Real Name can\'t be empty'));
00063         exit();
00064     } else if (($userName == 'admin' OR $realName == 'Administrator') AND $_SESSION['uid'] != 1) {
00065         utility::jsAlert(__('Login username or Real Name is probihited!'));
00066         exit();
00067     } else if (($passwd1 AND $passwd2) AND ($passwd1 !== $passwd2)) {
00068         utility::jsAlert(__('Password confirmation does not match. See if your Caps Lock key is on!'));
00069         exit();
00070     } else {
00071         $data['username'] = $dbs->escape_string($userName);
00072         $data['realname'] = $dbs->escape_string($realName);
00073         if (isset($_POST['noChangeGroup'])) {
00074             // parsing groups data
00075             $groups = '';
00076             if (isset($_POST['groups']) AND !empty($_POST['groups'])) {
00077                 $groups = serialize($_POST['groups']);
00078             } else {
00079                 $groups = 'literal{NULL}';
00080             }
00081             $data['groups'] = trim($groups);
00082         }
00083         if (($passwd1 AND $passwd2) AND ($passwd1 === $passwd2)) {
00084             $data['passwd'] = 'literal{MD5(\''.$passwd2.'\')}';
00085         }
00086         $data['input_date'] = date('Y-m-d');
00087         $data['last_update'] = date('Y-m-d');
00088 
00089         // create sql op object
00090         $sql_op = new simbio_dbop($dbs);
00091         if (isset($_POST['updateRecordID'])) {
00092             /* UPDATE RECORD MODE */
00093             // remove input date
00094             unset($data['input_date']);
00095             // filter update record ID
00096             $updateRecordID = (integer)$_POST['updateRecordID'];
00097             // update the data
00098             $update = $sql_op->update('user', $data, 'user_id='.$updateRecordID);
00099             if ($update) {
00100                 // write log
00101                 utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'system', $_SESSION['realname'].' update user data ('.$data['realname'].') with username ('.$data['username'].')');
00102                 utility::jsAlert(__('User Data Successfully Updated'));
00103                 echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', parent.getPreviousAJAXurl(), \'post\');</script>';
00104             } else { utility::jsAlert(__('User Data FAILED to Updated. Please Contact System Administrator')."\nDEBUG : ".$sql_op->error); }
00105             exit();
00106         } else {
00107             /* INSERT RECORD MODE */
00108             // insert the data
00109             if ($sql_op->insert('user', $data)) {
00110                 // write log
00111                 utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'system', $_SESSION['realname'].' add new user ('.$data['realname'].') with username ('.$data['username'].')');
00112                 utility::jsAlert(__('New User Data Successfully Saved'));
00113                 echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', \''.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'\', \'post\');</script>';
00114             } else { utility::jsAlert(__('User Data FAILED to Save. Please Contact System Administrator')."\n".$sql_op->error); }
00115             exit();
00116         }
00117     }
00118     exit();
00119 } else if (isset($_POST['itemID']) AND !empty($_POST['itemID']) AND isset($_POST['itemAction'])) {
00120     if (!($can_read AND $can_write)) {
00121         die();
00122     }
00123     /* DATA DELETION PROCESS */
00124     $sql_op = new simbio_dbop($dbs);
00125     $failed_array = array();
00126     $error_num = 0;
00127     if (!is_array($_POST['itemID'])) {
00128         // make an array
00129         $_POST['itemID'] = array((integer)$_POST['itemID']);
00130     }
00131     // loop array
00132     foreach ($_POST['itemID'] as $itemID) {
00133         $itemID = (integer)$itemID;
00134         // get user data
00135         $user_q = $dbs->query('SELECT username, realname FROM user WHERE user_id='.$itemID);
00136         $user_d = $user_q->fetch_row();
00137         if (!$sql_op->delete('user', "user_id='$itemID'")) {
00138             $error_num++;
00139         } else {
00140             // write log
00141             utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'system', $_SESSION['realname'].' DELETE user ('.$user_d[1].') with username ('.$user_d[0].')');
00142         }
00143     }
00144 
00145     // error alerting
00146     if ($error_num == 0) {
00147         utility::jsAlert(__('All Data Successfully Deleted'));
00148         echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', \''.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?'.$_POST['lastQueryStr'].'\', \'post\');</script>';
00149     } else {
00150         utility::jsAlert(__('Some or All Data NOT deleted successfully!\nPlease contact system administrator'));
00151         echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', \''.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?'.$_POST['lastQueryStr'].'\', \'post\');</script>';
00152     }
00153     exit();
00154 }
00155 /* RECORD OPERATION END */
00156 
00157 if (!$changecurrent) {
00158 /* search form */
00159 ?>
00160 <fieldset class="menuBox">
00161 <div class="menuBoxInner userIcon">
00162     <?php echo strtoupper(__('System Users')); ?> - <a href="#" onclick="setContent('mainContent', '<?php echo MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR; ?>system/app_user.php?action=detail', 'get');" class="headerText2"><?php echo __('Add New User'); ?></a>
00163     &nbsp; <a href="#" onclick="setContent('mainContent', '<?php echo MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR; ?>/system/app_user.php', 'get');" class="headerText2"><?php echo __('User List'); ?></a>
00164     <hr />
00165     <form name="search" action="blank.html" target="blindSubmit" onsubmit="$('doSearch').click();" id="search" method="get" style="display: inline;"><?php echo __('Search'); ?> :
00166     <input type="text" name="keywords" size="30" />
00167     <input type="button" id="doSearch" onclick="setContent('mainContent', '<?php echo MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR; ?>system/app_user.php?' + $('search').serialize(), 'post')" value="<?php echo __('Search'); ?>" class="button" />
00168 </form>

00175 /* main content */
00176 if (isset($_POST['detail']) OR (isset($_GET['action']) AND $_GET['action'] == 'detail')) {
00177     if (!($can_read AND $can_write) AND !$changecurrent) {
00178         die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You don\'t have enough privileges to view this section').'</div>');
00179     }
00180     /* RECORD FORM */
00181     // try query
00182     $itemID = (integer)isset($_POST['itemID'])?$_POST['itemID']:0;
00183     if ($changecurrent) {
00184         $itemID = (integer)$_SESSION['uid'];
00185     }
00186     $rec_q = $dbs->query('SELECT * FROM user WHERE user_id='.$itemID);
00187     $rec_d = $rec_q->fetch_assoc();
00188 
00189     // create new instance
00190     $form = new simbio_form_table_AJAX('mainForm', $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?'.$_SERVER['QUERY_STRING'], 'post');
00191     $form->submit_button_attr = 'name="saveData" value="'.__('Save').'" class="button"';
00192 
00193     // form table attributes
00194     $form->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00195     $form->table_header_attr = 'class="alterCell" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00196     $form->table_content_attr = 'class="alterCell2"';
00197 
00198     // edit mode flag set
00199     if ($rec_q->num_rows > 0) {
00200         $form->edit_mode = true;
00201         // record ID for delete process
00202         if (!$changecurrent) {
00203             // form record id
00204             $form->record_id = $itemID;
00205         } else {
00206             $form->addHidden('updateRecordID', $itemID);
00207             $form->back_button = false;
00208         }
00209         // form record title
00210         $form->record_title = $rec_d['realname'];
00211         // submit button attribute
00212         $form->submit_button_attr = 'name="saveData" value="'.__('Update').'" class="button"';
00213     }
00214 
00215     /* Form Element(s) */
00216     // user name
00217     $form->addTextField('text', 'userName', __('Login Username').'*', $rec_d['username'], 'style="width: 50%;"');
00218     // user real name
00219     $form->addTextField('text', 'realName', __('Real Name').'*', $rec_d['realname'], 'style="width: 50%;"');
00220     // user group
00221     // only appear by user who hold system module privileges
00222     if (!$changecurrent AND $can_read AND $can_write) {
00223         // add hidden element as a flag that we dont change group data
00224         $form->addHidden('noChangeGroup', '1');
00225         // user group
00226         $group_query = $dbs->query('SELECT group_id, group_name FROM
00227             user_group WHERE group_id != 1');
00228         // initiliaze group options
00229         $group_options = array();
00230         while ($group_data = $group_query->fetch_row()) {
00231             $group_options[] = array($group_data[0], $group_data[1]);
00232         }
00233         $form->addCheckBox('groups', __('Group(s)'), $group_options, unserialize($rec_d['groups']));
00234     }
00235     // user password
00236     $form->addTextField('password', 'passwd1', __('New Password').'*', '', 'style="width: 50%;"');
00237     // user password confirm
00238     $form->addTextField('password', 'passwd2', __('Confirm New Password').'*', '', 'style="width: 50%;"');
00239 
00240     // edit mode messagge
00241     if ($form->edit_mode) {
00242         echo '<div class="infoBox">'.__('You are going to edit user profile'),' : <b>'.$rec_d['realname'].'</b> <br />'.__('Last Update').$rec_d['last_update'].' //mfc
00243             <br />'.__('Leave Password field blank if you don\'t want to change the password').'</div>';
00244     }
00245     // print out the form object
00246     echo $form->printOut();
00247 } else {
00248     // only administrator have privileges to view user list
00249     if (!($can_read AND $can_write) OR $_SESSION['uid'] != 1) {
00250         die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You don\'t have enough privileges to view this section').'</div>');
00251     }
00252 
00253     /* USER LIST */
00254     // table spec
00255     $table_spec = 'user AS u';
00256 
00257     // create datagrid
00258     $datagrid = new simbio_datagrid();
00259     if ($can_read AND $can_write) {
00260         $datagrid->setSQLColumn('u.user_id',
00261             'u.realname AS \''.__('Real Name').'\'',
00262             'u.username AS \''.__('Login Username').'\'',
00263             'u.last_login AS \''.__('Last Login').'\'',
00264             'u.last_update AS \''.__('Last Update').'\'');
00265     } else {
00266         $datagrid->setSQLColumn('u.realname AS \''.__('Real Name').'\'',
00267             'u.username AS \''.__('Real Name').'\'',
00268             'u.last_login AS \''.__('Last Login').'\'',
00269             'u.last_update AS \''.__('Last Update').'\'');
00270     }
00271     $datagrid->setSQLorder('username ASC');
00272 
00273     // is there any search
00274     $criteria = 'u.user_id != 1 ';
00275     if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00276        $keywords = $dbs->escape_string($_GET['keywords']);
00277        $criteria .= " AND (u.username LIKE '%$keywords%' OR u.realname LIKE '%$keywords%')";
00278     }
00279     $datagrid->setSQLCriteria($criteria);
00280 
00281     // set table and table header attributes
00282     $datagrid->icon_edit = SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'admin/'.$sysconf['admin_template']['dir'].'/'.$sysconf['admin_template']['theme'].'/edit.gif';
00283     $datagrid->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00284     $datagrid->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeader" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00285     // set delete proccess URL
00286     $datagrid->chbox_form_URL = $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'];
00287 
00288     // put the result into variables
00289     $datagrid_result = $datagrid->createDataGrid($dbs, $table_spec, 20, ($can_read AND $can_write));
00290     if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00291         $msg = str_replace('{result->num_rows}', $datagrid->num_rows, __('Found <strong>{result->num_rows}</strong> from your keywords')); //mfc
00292         echo '<div class="infoBox">'.$msg.' : "'.$_GET['keywords'].'"</div>';
00293     }
00294 
00295     echo $datagrid_result;
00296 }
